This is honestly my favorite restaurant in the city.  Every visit we come here, this last time we even went two nights in a row!  You choose your own fresh seafood so you can have a selection of everything if you want.  The lobster paella is out of this world!  Our go to meal for 2 of us is always fried calamari, lobster paella, a bottle of Pero Verde and dessert.  That adds up to about €75, which is a bargain for the quality.  Service is always good and prompt, never any complaints there and the food comes out quick.
